text:
hi, I'm trying FOP for the first time and from runtests.bat/sh I get

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: 
org/apache/tools/ant/Main

I know its the entry point, I searched all the jars and it doesn't appear 
anywhere. could be ant.jar which I'm missing?

I did find org/apache/fop/tools/anttasks/RunTest.class

which looks like a name change, but it doesn't seem to have a main.  Can't find 
another entry point off hand.

--Matt
creator: matthews@zivo.co.nz

text: The ant.jar is included in the distribution for 0.20.x.
